poem:
Title: "Words on the Air"

In the penumbral light  
Gaza's refrain echoes  
on Radio 4 PM.  
The fervent call of Lammy,  
a seagull crying peace over the  
stormy sea of politics.  
Starmer pivots, Commons stirs -  
Each voice seeking the same homeland -  
An immediate ceasefire,  
the labour of human care.  
Hope—a fragile bird—takes flight. Yet,  
will Government provide the wind?
